metadata.synopsis: When the party starts the combat with dying hyenas, one of them - healthy hyena - will run away to call the gnolls nearby. This PAD is to ensure the player will understand what hyena is up to.
metadata.how_to_trigger: * Start a combat with hyenas at 26; 30; 527* One healthy hyena will bark and will try to run away during its turn.* One of the players will trigger the PAD

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Watch it - that hyena's going for help!
